item.title: cheatsheet for life ‚úçÔ∏è
item.description: You are unique ü´∂ Believe in yourself We have all got a little bit of ‘save the world’ in us. It’s ok if you only save one person, and it’s ok if that person is you. Leave every place/relationship (even family) that doesn’t value you. Love yourself. Believe in yourself. “Be gentle with yourself; show yourself the same kindness and patience you might show a young child - the child you once were.

item.title: reviews üîó
item.description: Movies watched/ing: wilspi Web-Series/Shows watched/ing: wilspi This page is archived. How do I rate the movies? Rating Scale? Elements? Screenplay Dialogues, Plot, Cinematography For me I shall believe what the director wants me to believe, I dont want him to explain everything, however, I want him to create consistent characters, inconsistency in characters irks me off.

item.title: simple pleasures ‚òï
item.description: These simple pleasures are the real luxuries: Clean Sheets Coming home and the feeling of getting into bed with clean sheets after the shower Hearing a song that you haven’t thought of in a while First cup of chai in the morning A hot bath Going on a walk or ride with soft sun and cool breeze A good night’s sleep Listening to birds singing Favourite home cooked meal Colorful sunsets

item.title: thought journal ü§î
item.description: Opinions As such, many entries in this blog express opinions. However, one can view this page as a space for sharing general opinions. Alcohol is considered bad because it causes one to lose control over senses. Anything that causes one to lose control over their senses is bad. Golden rule of partying: One party, Two Drinks Main purpose is Socialising. It‚Äôs a platform to meet people and make new friends, not to get drunk.
